text: Tags such as the JSTL <x:out> tag that have idempotent attribute values are being reinitialized before use. The specification allows the container to pool and reuse tags with the same attribute values, calling them multiple times without reinitializing the values. However, the code generated by Jasper always sets the attribute values after retrieving an instance from the pool even if they have constant values.
creator: jboynes@apache.org
jboynes@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: I'm leaning towards marking this as WONTFIX. Trying to write the code to do this even for simple cases looks like it will increase the complexity of the generation code significantly.
